name: part_006
file: tmp_【Birthdayお披露目】かわいいけどかっこいいを目指していくヴァ！！【#ときのそら生誕祭ライブ 】 [AtbVQjUesq4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora in her white dress, talking to the audience about her feelings on the stage and thanking them for their comments.
A special transformation sequence where Tokino Sora changes from her white dress into her blue and white idol outfit.
Sora, in her new outfit, continues the MC section, interacting with the crowd and her mascot Ankimo before introducing the next song.
Tokino Sora performs the song 'Yumezora Fanfare' alongside her mascot Ankimo.

subtitles.original: ...なっています。
subtitles.english: ...it has become.

subtitles.original: やあ、こんな素敵なステージでね
subtitles.english: Yeah, on such a wonderful stage

subtitles.original: 歌えるなんて本当に幸せですし
subtitles.english: I'm really happy to be able to sing,

subtitles.original: こんなにたくさんのコメントでみんなと一緒に盛り上がっていけるのも楽しいです。
subtitles.english: and it's also fun to be able to get excited with everyone through so many comments.

subtitles.original: 本当にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: さあ、次はどんな...
subtitles.english: Now, what kind of...

subtitles.original: ...姿になっているのかな？
subtitles.english: ...appearance will I have next?

subtitles.original: 衣装チェンジ、しちゃおうかな？
subtitles.english: Shall I do a costume change?

subtitles.original: ありがとう！見えてるー！
subtitles.english: Thank you! I can see you!

subtitles.original: 二階のみんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone on the second floor!

subtitles.original: 奥のみんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone in the back!

subtitles.original: そして、コメントもー！
subtitles.english: And the comments too!

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: こんな素敵なステージでみんなとお誕生日配信ができて
subtitles.english: To be able to do this birthday stream with everyone on such a wonderful stage

subtitles.original: 幸せだー！ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy! Thank you!

subtitles.original: いつも見てくれてありがとうね。
subtitles.english: Thank you for always watching.

subtitles.original: みんなが曲とかフリ覚えて、こうやって見に来てくれてるの
subtitles.english: Everyone remembering the songs and moves and coming to see me like this

subtitles.original: 本当に嬉しいよ！
subtitles.english: It makes me really happy!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！嬉しい嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Thank you! I'm so happy, so happy!

subtitles.original: あん肝ー！
subtitles.english: Ankimo!

subtitles.original: あん肝ー！あん肝ー！あん肝ー！
subtitles.english: Ankimo! Ankimo! Ankimo!

subtitles.original: ぺっぺっぺっ
subtitles.english: Pe pe pe

subtitles.original: 何で？えっえっえっ
subtitles.english: Why? Eh? Eh? Eh?

subtitles.original: というわけで
subtitles.english: So,

subtitles.original: なんと、ここからはあん肝と一緒にステージをやりたいなと思ってて
subtitles.english: well, from here on, I'd like to do the stage together with Ankimo.

subtitles.original: 踊れる？あん肝。練習してきた？
subtitles.english: Can you dance, Ankimo? Did you practice?

subtitles.original: 本当？本当？
subtitles.english: Really? Really?

subtitles.original: というわけで、ここからはあん肝と一緒に...
subtitles.english: So, from here on, with Ankimo...

subtitles.original: いじめてないよ！これは私の愛情表現。あん肝、私の愛情表現だから。
subtitles.english: I'm not bullying him! This is my expression of love. Ankimo, it's my expression of love.

subtitles.original: ね、ね。
subtitles.english: Right? Right?

subtitles.original: ちょっと飲み物持ってくるね。
subtitles.english: I'm going to go grab a drink.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ここからは一緒に踊っていこうか！
subtitles.english: Then, let's dance together from here on!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ, いくよ！
subtitles.english: Alright, here we go!

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください、ユメゾラ☆ファンファーレ！
subtitles.english: Now please listen to: Yumezora Fanfare!

subtitles.original: 約束した今日の日を
subtitles.english: This day we promised,

subtitles.original: 一生忘れない そんな気がした
subtitles.english: I felt I'd never forget it for the rest of my life

subtitles.original: ユメゾラの真下で
subtitles.english: Right under the dream sky

subtitles.original:
ユメゾラ☆ファンファーレ
作詞:まつもとななみ 作曲・編曲:藤原彩豊
subtitles.english:
Yumezora Fanfare
Lyrics: Nanami Matsumoto Composition/Arrangement: Ayato Fujiwara

subtitles.original: あの空の向こうまで行ってみたいなって
subtitles.english: I want to go beyond that sky

subtitles.original: 覗き込んだ望遠鏡 宝探しみたいだ
subtitles.english: Peering through the telescope is like a treasure hunt

subtitles.original: 「好き」が夢を叶えるって誰かが言ってた
subtitles.english: Someone said that "liking" something makes dreams come true

subtitles.original: 思い切り泣いたり笑ったり
subtitles.english: Crying and laughing as hard as I can

subtitles.original: 全力前進でしょう
subtitles.english: Full speed ahead, right?

subtitles.original: あぁ夜明けが星座を追い越した時
subtitles.english: Ah, when the dawn overtook the constellations

subtitles.original: 流れる星が光った
subtitles.english: A shooting star shone

subtitles.original: 一つだけ願うのなら 夢が叶う瞬間
subtitles.english: If I could make just one wish, at the moment a dream comes true

subtitles.original: そばにいてくれますか？
subtitles.english: Will you be by my side?

subtitles.original: 見に行こう ハッピーエンドのファンファーレ
subtitles.english: Let's go see the fanfare of the happy ending

subtitles.original: キラキラの未来へ
subtitles.english: To a sparkling future

subtitles.original: 星に負けない光と 昂る希望響かせ
subtitles.english: With a light that rivals the stars, let rising hope resound

subtitles.original: 涙と涙が重なって 空が明けるように
subtitles.english: As tears and tears overlap, just like the dawn breaking in the sky

subtitles.original: 夢と夢がギュッと重なる瞬間を
subtitles.english: The moment when dreams and dreams overlap tightly

subtitles.original: 奇跡と呼ぶんだ
subtitles.english: Is what we call a miracle
